name: PearlLoc
description: Luxury Paper-based, child resistant boxes and tubes for vape hardware and cannabis products.
seo_title: PearlLoc | Cannabis Paper-based Boxes and Tubes
seo_description: Fully affordable customizable PearlLoc paper-based boxes for cannabis vape hardware. Customization options including shape, size, color & labelling.
advantages: Ask about PearlLoc options made in the USA
first_description: PearlLoc tubes offer sleek, modern and sustainable secondary packaging for anything from pre-rolls to edibles and vapes.
second_description: Make your PearlLoc packaging uniquely yours with extensive printing, decoration, embossing, texture and branding options.
third_description: Non CR boxes and tubes for a variety of packaging needs.
